original_title: The Still Image and the Labour Process: An Agitka
overview: The Still Image and the Labour Process: An Agitka is an experimental short film made in the style of a silent Soviet agitational-propaganda short (agitka). In proper Soviet, or perhaps Vertovian, fashion, it argues through intertitles and montage that the cinema is a weapon for destroying the commodifying effects of still photography.
title: The Still Image and the Labour Process: An Agitka
